Brokerage turned positive on India’s equity markets earlier this year after a cautious outlook in 2024, maintains that India’s macroeconomic recovery is already und

items.title: Bernstein stays cautious on India exposure, prefers low volatility, large-caps
items.summary: Investing.com -- Bernstein maintained a cautious stance on India exposure despite early signs of market inflection, advising against chasing small/mid-caps and high-volatility stocks.
